Text.Value: My connection to the Absolute is private. I can't pray in front of lowly novices.
*Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*
Step up to the shrine, touching your fingers to your heart and your head.
*As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*
Glory to the Absolute!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The goblin holds his arm over the shrine, and then cuts open his wrist. (You don't have to show this, just suggest it and have some SFX)
EditorData.NodeContext: Said while the goblin slits open his own wrist.
EditorData.SFXTags: [WI] Audio support for offscreen cutting of the wrist

Text.Value: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*
The Absolute wants more - you should add your own blood to the offering.
*Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*
*The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*
Apologies, ma'am. I already lost a lot of blood durin' the fight - an' I still have to see the shrine finished.
Apologies, sir. I already lost a lot of blood durin' the fight - an' I still have to see the shrine finished.
Apologies, True Soul. I already lost a lot of blood durin' the fight - an' I still have to see the shrine finished.
Offer a silent prayer to Shar.
C-certainly.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The goblin turns to the shrine.
EditorData.NodeContext: You just ordered the goblin to spill his own blood in the honour of his god.

Text.Value: Certainly. I meant no offence, True Soul.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Astarion step up to the shrine and drink the bowl of blood.

Text.Value: Let the Absolute hear your prayers. Let the blood of Her enemies flow over you!
*The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*
You hear the Absolute's voice, don't you? I will soon - I can already feel Her coming closer!
May the Absolute give us all power!
The Absolute wants more - you should add your own blood to the offering.
*A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
*Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*
*Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*
Put the bowl to your lips and drink every last drop.
May the Absolute be with you forever, sir!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is astonished for a moment, staring, then gets his act together.
EditorData.NodeContext: The goblin just saw the player drink a bowl with blood. He's looking up to him and is going to imitate him later. He thinks this is the correct way of honouring the Absolute.

Text.Value: Leave.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Step up to the shrine, touching your fingers to your heart and your head.

Text.Value: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

Synopsis: Fanatic goblin who is building a shrine to the Absolute in your camp.
